meanings.definition: The act or process of casting type for printing.
meanings.sent1: The typefoundings were carefully crafted to ensure clear printing.
meanings.sent2: The printer needed new typefoundings to replace the worn-out ones.
meanings.sent3: The typefoundings decided to take a break from being cast and went on a vacation.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like typefoundings, leaving a lasting impression on everyone she met.
meanings.sent5: The typefoundings gleamed in the sunlight, ready to bring words to life on the page.

meanings.definition: A collection of typefaces or fonts.
meanings.sent1: The graphic designer had a vast collection of typefoundings for different projects.
meanings.sent2: The book publisher carefully selected the typefoundings for the new novel.
meanings.sent3: The typefoundings in the drawer seemed to be having a party when no one was looking.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a treasure trove of typefoundings, each font telling a different story.
meanings.sent5: The typefoundings on the computer screen danced together in perfect harmony.

meanings.definition: The business or craft of designing and producing typefaces.
meanings.sent1: She excelled in the art of typefoundings, creating unique fonts for clients.
meanings.sent2: The typefoundings industry was booming with new designers entering the field.
meanings.sent3: The typefoundings workshop was filled with the sound of creativity and innovation.
meanings.sent4: His passion for typefoundings was like a flame, burning brightly in his work.
meanings.sent5: The world of typefoundings was vast and full of endless possibilities for exploration.
